column4: Hmm? Ah, yeah, I guess we did.
Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
Of course. I was going to do it anyway.
But I appreciate that you came looking for me and asked me to do it.
You really care about me, and our relationship.
Let's do it properly, when we're married, okay?
Fufu~, of course. Who's girlfriend do you think I am?

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: Eh?! What? Do you understand what you're saying?
I do, trust me. I understand.
We're still students, you know?! There's no way we can raise a child. We're still kids ourselves, dummy.
Trust me. I'll take responsibility. Don't worry.
….Okay. Whatever you say. I do trust you, so I'll go along with it. Just don't abandon me if it happens, okay?
…I know. You wouldn't. Not you. I love you, you know that, right?
